pullrequest.title: Change default cfm parameter value from 0 to 1e-6 to improve numerical behavior.

content.raw:
I don't think it would, I did spend time in change the cfm to a nonzero value, and worked with the branch "issue_1437_test" and it still fails. 
Besides, I checked with the gzclient side, which surely blow up all the double pendulum, within a short time.  But it does work with my "asme" branch.
